ygData.subject: Re: There Is No Escape
ygData.msgSnippet: The others manage to get back to base. (No moding, they are near their base, now) Deemos is still running around Mobster. (Nice name for a Gestalt, huh?)

The others manage to get back to base. (No moding, they are near their base,
now) Deemos is still running around Mobster. (Nice name for a Gestalt, huh?)
Mobster takes the damage and growls. He fires back on Warmachine and then
fires at Oblitertron. He grabs Deemos, who complains and backflips away from
the 2 Gestalts...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 16, 2000 9:03 AM
Subject: Re: There Is No Escape


> These arguements are starting to tick me off. Yes, I did ask KSL to be a
> moderator, because he has much more RPGing experience than me, and I am
> running very low on time, and cutting alot of events I shouldn't to be
able
> to RP. THat doesn't mean he's in charge of the RPG, or has any special
> powers. Everyone can point out where rules are broken (but it might get
> annoying), but KSL is stricter than me, so I figured he'd make a good
> moderator. I admit that small rules don't need to be pointed out (swearing
in
> OOC mails, etc.) but moding and the like does.
>
> And SoulStice, I'd like you to show me the post where Unitron broke the
shot
> limit. I could at least be sure that KSL is human then... (kidding)
>
> But everyone leave KSL alone, he's only doing his job. And start arguing.
>
> ::Zardus/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer/WarMachine::
>
> Zardus watches the Chosen Mafia scramble to retreat, frowning. Looking
down
> at his wrist comp, Zardus taps a few buttons, the Alliance base tracking
> Deemos' group's location and keeping a watch on them.
>
> "Should we follow?" War Machine's voice booms as he steps closer to
Zardus,
> looking at the combining Mafia in the distance.
>
> "Yes," Zardus says, "Kill them."
>
> WarMachine nods, running at the Mafia gestalt, firing missiles and plasma
> charges.
>
> "Dark One," Zardus says into his comm, "Can you and your group combine and
> take that enemy gestalt out?"
>
> "Everyone else," he says after switching his comm to the whole Alliance,
"If
> you're not too damage, pursue and destroy. If you are damaged, get into
the
> CR chambers."
>
> With that, he activates his jetpack, flying after the Mafia and firing at
> Deemos.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Bloodystrike recieves Zardus' orders, flying past the running WarMachine
and
> firing a missile at Sharpedge.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Reptilica steps out of the CR chamber, grumbling about dangerous work when
he
> recieves Zardus' transmission. He walks to a door, taking off at the exit
of
> the base at a run.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer comes to a stop as he sees the Chosen Mafia retreating a few
dozen
> feet away from him.
>
> "That's them!" he yells as he sees the Alliance shots heading for them,
"We
> need ta kill 'em!"
>
> He pulls out his stun gun again, running after Stronghold and firing.
>
>
>
>
